name: clitoral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or involving the clitoris (= a sexual organ above the vagina that can give a woman sexual pleasure when it is touched): There is now greater understanding of the clitoral structure. See
clitoris
More examplesFewer examplesThe clitoral hood covers the clitoris.As a child she suffered clitoral circumcision.A clitoral orgasm results from direct stimulation of the clitoris and surrounding tissue.Clitoral piercing should only be done by an experienced piercer.
